about.title: Software Engineer - Front end
about.summary: Experienced Front-end Developer with over 3 years of expertise in $ReactJs$$, $React Native$$, and other front-end technologies. Proficient in $Antd$$, $Bootstrap$$, $jQuery$$, and $JavaScript$$, with database skills in $MySQL$$. Successfully contributed to projects for clients in the US and Vietnam during my tenure at 1@Halozend@@. Currently applying my skills at 2@Dision@@ to develop solutions for clients in Germany. Known for dedication to delivering high-quality solutions and ability to tackle complex challenges effectively.

technical.Frameworks/_Platforms: React, NextJS, Wordpress, React Native, Laravel, Angular, NodeJS, Docker, Vuejs
technical.IDEs: Visual Studio Code, PHPStorm, XCode, Android Studio, Sublime text, Visual Studio

education.Knowledge: C++, C#, Java, Microsoft SQL Server,...
